Content:
Have you ever been stressed out at work
Of course there's a time when I got  at work
Burned-out
Discouraged
Depressed

Have you ever considered quiting your job
I have  in the past
Been in a similar situation
Gone through a stressful period
Been close to quitting

Do you think quiting can solve the problem
Quitting your job may seem like 
A quick fix
An easy way out
A measure of last resort

Do you think I'm overreacting
It's  to feel that way
Complete understandable
Totally reasonable
Not surprising

Why do you think so
Everyone has 
Been in yours shoes
Encountered job-related challenges
Dealt with stress

Do you have any suggestions
I think you should  to make you feel comfortable
Find a work-life balance
Take some time off
Find a new job

Why do you think it works
It's a great way to 
Switch off from work mode
Clear your head
Release tension

How has work been treating you lately
It has been 
Pretty good
A bit up and down
A bit boring

What is the pay like in your current job
I find the payment 
Steady
Adequate for my contribution
A bit low

Is the pay enough to live on
It is 
Barely enough to get by
Sufficient to live on
not enough to live on

How do you spend your current salary wisely
I often 
Avoid unnecessary expenes
Tighten my belt
Shop smart

What income level are you aiming for
Ideally i would like to reach a salary level that can 
Cover my expensex
Enable me to invest
Allow for some savings

What are your plans to increase your income
Maybe I should 
Have a backup financial plan
Ask for a salary increase
Look for some gigs

Are you thinking of changing your job
I am  to quit my job
Conflicted
Planning
Hesitant

Why are you considering a job change
I feel like I have not been 
Using my degree properly
Getting along with coworkers
Finding any more room for development

Are you sure you will not have to a similar issue in another role
I cannot say for sure but I am hoping for 
A fresh start
A more supportive team
A better work-life fit

What are the risks of quiting your job now
I think I will face 
Fianancial uncertainly
Job hunt hurdles
Challenges in my career change

How do you plan to deal with those risks
I have  as a backup 
A solid professional network
Some money
A part-time gig

What will motivate you to go to work every day
What keeps me going yo work every day might be 
The challenging projects
The opportunity to make a differene
The dynamic work environment

What kind of job do you see yourself doing in the future
I want a job that 
Makes use of my skills
Encourages creactivity
Promotes collaboration

How do you feel about your line manager
My line manager is 
Supportive
Approachable
Trustworthy

Is there anything you hope your boss could improve
I think my line manager could improve the 
Motivational skills
Ability to inspire
Empowerment skills in leadership

What have you learned from your boss
I have learned  from my boss
Strategic thinking
Adaptability
Training tactics

In which contexts have you learned these skills
It comes from a situation when we had to 
Meet a tight deadline for a crucial proposal
Take care of last-minute clients
Guide a new group of interns

Who would you be as a leader
If I were to become a leader I would 
Foster a collaborative environment
Foster an empowering work environment
Foster an inspirational work environment

What kind of challenges would a leader have to deal with
I believe leaders face various pressures such as 
Managing conflicts
Meeting many targets
Making tough decisions

How does that awareness impact you
I have become more 
Empathetic towards my boss
Motivated to work harder
Inspired to learn new things

Will you receive a bonus this Lunar New Year
I will  a Lunar New Year bonus this year
Receive
Not have

What are your company 's gifts on this occasion
Our company usually gives out 
Lucky money
Traditional Vietnamese food hampers
Comapny-branded merchandise

I would consider using that money to 
Pay off any pending bills
Upgrade my home appliances
Enjoy a lavish getaway

Why would you spend money on that
It would give me 
Peace of mind during Tet
A more comfortable living space
A chance to get away form the everyday

Has your company ever cut back on Lunar New Year bonuses
Our company has  Lunar New Year bonuses
Never reduced
Regularly offered
Cut back on

If it happened I would be 
Speechless
Resentful
